20110130190032.000|20110130190033.000|CC1|ATTEMPTS TO QUELL THE UPRISING, 
20110130190033.000|20110130190033.000|CC1|POURING INTO THE STREETS,

20110130190034.000|20110130190036.000|CC1|PRESIDENT HOSNI MUBARAK.

20110130190036.000|20110130190037.000|CC1|LINE, SUPPORTING A VITAL U.S.   
20110130190037.000|20110130190038.000|CC1|ALLY BUT SIDING WITH THE        
20110130190038.000|20110130190039.000|CC1|EGYPTIAN PEOPLE WHO WANT FREEDOM
20110130190039.000|20110130190041.000|CC1|AND THEIR DEMOCRATIC RIGHTS.

20110130190236.000|20110130190241.000|CC1|VICE PRESIDENT.

20110130190250.000|20110130190251.000|CC1|TIME WITH YOU IS LIMITED.       
20110130190251.000|20110130190253.000|CC1|ON MONDAY YOU SAID THAT THE     
20110130190253.000|20110130190253.000|CC1|EGYPTIAN GOVERNMENT WAS STABLE  
20110130190253.000|20110130190254.000|CC1|AND WAS LOOKING FOR WAYS TO     
20110130190254.000|20110130190255.000|CC1|RESPOND TO THE WISHES OF THE    
20110130190255.000|20110130190256.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110130190256.000|20110130190259.000|CC1|HAVE YOU CHANGED YOUR VIEW?     
20110130190259.000|20110130190302.000|CC1|>> YOU KNOW, DAVID, THIS IS A   
20110130190302.000|20110130190303.000|CC1|VERY VOLATILE SITUATION.        
20110130190303.000|20110130190304.000|CC1|I THINK AS WE MONITOR IT        
20110130190304.000|20110130190307.000|CC1|CLOSELY, WE CONTINUE TO URGE THE
20110130190307.000|20110130190308.000|CC1|EGYPTIAN GOVERNMENT AS THE      
20110130190308.000|20110130190310.000|CC1|UNITED STATES HAS FOR 30 YEARS  
20110130190310.000|20110130190312.000|CC1|TO RESPOND TO THE LEGITIMATE    
20110130190312.000|20110130190314.000|CC1|ASPIRATIONS OF THE EGYPTIAN     
20110130190314.000|20110130190317.000|CC1|PEOPLE, AND BEGIN TO TAKE       
20110130190317.000|20110130190319.000|CC1|CONCRETE STEPS TO IMPLEMENT     
20110130190319.000|20110130190322.000|CC1|DEMOCRATIC AND ECONOMIC REFORM. 
20110130190322.000|20110130190323.000|CC1|AT THE SAME TIME WE RECOGNIZE   
20110130190323.000|20110130190327.000|CC1|THAT WE HAVE TO DEAL WITH THE   
20110130190327.000|20110130190331.000|CC1|SITUATION AS IT IS, AND WE ARE  
20110130190331.000|20110130190335.000|CC1|HEARTENED BY WHAT WE HEAR FROM  
20110130190335.000|20110130190340.000|CC1|OUR CONTACTS THAT AT LEAST THUS 
20110130190340.000|20110130190343.000|CC1|FAR THE ARMY HAS BEEN TRYING TO 
20110130190343.000|20110130190344.000|CC1|BRING A SENSE OF ORDER WITHOUT

20110130190346.000|20110130190347.000|CC1|DISTINCTION AS THEY ARE

20110130190348.000|20110130190353.000|CC1|PEACEFUL PROTESTERS WHOSE       
20110130190353.000|20110130190354.000|CC1|ASPIRATIONS NEED TO BE          
20110130190354.000|20110130190355.000|CC1|ADDRESSED AND THOSE WHO TAKE

20110130190355.000|20110130190356.000|CC1|LOOTING OR OTHER CRIMINAL

20110130190409.000|20110130190411.000|CC1|HOSNI MUBARAK STABLE THIS

20110130190456.000|20110130190459.000|CC1|CALL FOR FREE AND FAIR ELECTIONS
20110130190459.000|20110130190503.000|CC1|AND WOULD YOU ASK MUBARAK TO SAY

20110130190535.000|20110130190538.000|CC1|WILL NOT RUN?                   
20110130190538.000|20110130190540.000|CC1|>> DAVID, THESE ISSUES ARE UP TO
20110130190540.000|20110130190544.000|CC1|THE EGYPTIAN PEOPLE, AND THEY   
20110130190544.000|20110130190547.000|CC1|HAVE TO MAKE THESE DECISIONS.   
20110130190547.000|20110130190548.000|CC1|BUT OUR POSITION IS VERY CLEAR. 
20110130190548.000|20110130190549.000|CC1|WE HAVE URGED FOR 30 YEARS THAT 
20110130190549.000|20110130190553.000|CC1|THERE BE A VICE PRESIDENT AND   
20110130190553.000|20110130190554.000|CC1|FINALLY A VICE PRESIDENT WAS    
20110130190554.000|20110130190559.000|CC1|ANNOUNCED JUST A DAY OR TWO AGO.
20110130190559.000|20110130190602.000|CC1|SO WE HAVE TRIED TO, IN OUR     
20110130190602.000|20110130190603.000|CC1|PARTNERSHIP WITH EGYPT, TO MAKE 
20110130190603.000|20110130190604.000|CC1|THE POINT OVER AND OVER AGAIN   
20110130190604.000|20110130190605.000|CC1|ABOUT WHAT WILL CREATE A BETTER 
20110130190605.000|20110130190606.000|CC1|PATHWAY FOR THE EGYPTIAN PEOPLE 
20110130190606.000|20110130190608.000|CC1|IN TERMS OF GREATER             
20110130190608.000|20110130190609.000|CC1|PARTICIPATION WITH POLITICAL    
20110130190609.000|20110130190611.000|CC1|REFORMS AND GREATER ECONOMIC    
20110130190611.000|20110130190613.000|CC1|OPPORTUNITY.                    
20110130190613.000|20110130190623.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, I SPOKE ABOUT THIS    
20110130190623.000|20110130190626.000|CC1| VERY CLEARLY IN DOHA, SEEMS    
20110130190626.000|20110130190629.000|CC1|LIKE A LONG TIME AGO, BUT JUST  
20110130190629.000|20110130190632.000|CC1|ABOUT TWO WEEKS AGO, WHERE I    
20110130190632.000|20110130190632.000|CC1|OUTLINED THAT WHATEVER WAS      
20110130190632.000|20110130190634.000|CC1|POSSIBLE IN THE 20th CENTURY IS 
20110130190634.000|20110130190638.000|CC1|NO LONGER POSSIBLE FOR REGIMES  
20110130190638.000|20110130190641.000|CC1|IN THE 21st CENTURY.            
20110130190641.000|20110130190642.000|CC1|THE WORLD IS MOVING FAST.       
20110130190642.000|20110130190642.000|CC1|THERE'S TOO MUCH INFORMATION.   
20110130190642.000|20110130190643.000|CC1|PEOPLE'S ASPIRATIONS AND        
20110130190643.000|20110130190644.000|CC1|CERTAINLY THE CLASSES THROUGHOUT
20110130190644.000|20110130190644.000|CC1|THE WORLD DEMAND RESPONSIVE     
20110130190644.000|20110130190645.000|CC1|PARTICIPATORY GOVERNMENT AND    
20110130190645.000|20110130190646.000|CC1|THAT'S WHAT WE EXPECT TO SEE    
20110130190646.000|20110130190648.000|CC1|HAPPEN.                         
20110130190648.000|20110130190649.000|CC1|>> I JUST WANT TO PIN YOU DOWN  
20110130190649.000|20110130190652.000|CC1|ON THIS, DO YOU THINK THAT THE  
20110130190652.000|20110130190654.000|CC1|MUBARAK REGIME HAS TAKEN THE    
20110130190654.000|20110130190655.000|CC1|NECESSARY STEPS TO RETAIN POWER?
20110130190655.000|20110130190655.000|CC1|>> OH, I THINK THERE ARE MANY,  
20110130190655.000|20110130190656.000|CC1|MANY STEPS THAT HAVE TO BE TAKEN
20110130190656.000|20110130190657.000|CC1|AND IT'S NOT A QUESTION OF WHO  
20110130190657.000|20110130190658.000|CC1|RETAINS POWER, THAT SHOULD NOT  
20110130190658.000|20110130190659.000|CC1|BE THE ISSUE.

20110130190706.000|20110130190708.000|CC1|PATH.                           
20110130190708.000|20110130190709.000|CC1|CLEARLY, THE PATH THAT HAS BEEN 
20110130190709.000|20110130190711.000|CC1|FOLLOWED HAS NOT BEEN ONE THAT  
20110130190711.000|20110130190716.000|CC1|HAS CREATED THAT DEMOCRATIC     
20110130190716.000|20110130190717.000|CC1|FUTURE THAT ECONOMIC OPPORTUNITY
20110130190717.000|20110130190720.000|CC1|THAT PEOPLE IN THE PEACEFUL     
20110130190720.000|20110130190721.000|CC1|PROTESTS ARE SEEKING.           
20110130190721.000|20110130190722.000|CC1|IT'S OUR VERY STRONG ADVICE     
20110130190722.000|20110130190723.000|CC1|WHICH WE HAVE DELIVERED,        
20110130190723.000|20110130190724.000|CC1|PRESIDENT OBAMA SPOKE WITH      
20110130190724.000|20110130190728.000|CC1|PRESIDENT MUBARAK, I'VE SPOKEN  
20110130190728.000|20110130190728.000|CC1|WITH MY COUNTERPART, SECRETARY  
20110130190728.000|20110130190729.000|CC1|GATES HAS SPOKEN WITH HIS.      
20110130190729.000|20110130190730.000|CC1|THIS IS AN ONGOING CONVERSATION 
20110130190730.000|20110130190731.000|CC1|THAT AMERICAN OFFICIALS HAVE HAD
20110130190731.000|20110130190733.000|CC1|FOR 30 YEARS.                   
20110130190733.000|20110130190735.000|CC1|NOW IS THE TIME TO MOVE TOWARDS 
20110130190735.000|20110130190739.000|CC1|A NATIONAL DIALOGUE, TO TAKE    
20110130190739.000|20110130190741.000|CC1|CONCRETE STEPS, TO CREATE THE   
20110130190741.000|20110130190743.000|CC1|POLITICAL SPACE FOR PEACEFUL    
20110130190743.000|20110130190747.000|CC1|PROTEST AND FOR THE CREATION OF 
20110130190747.000|20110130190748.000|CC1|PEACEFUL OPPOSITIONS THAT WANT  
20110130190748.000|20110130190749.000|CC1|TO HELP WORK TOWARDS A BETTER   
20110130190749.000|20110130190749.000|CC1|FUTURE.                         
20110130190749.000|20110130190751.000|CC1|THAT IS WHAT WE WANT TO SEE.    
20110130190751.000|20110130190756.000|CC1|>> SHOULD MUBARAK LOSE POWER,   
20110130190756.000|20110130190758.000|CC1|WOULD THE UNITED STATES OFFER

20110130194027.000|20110130194028.000|CC1|IT SHOWS YOU HOW HARD IT HAS    
20110130194028.000|20110130194029.000|CC1|BEEN FOR THE PRESIDENT HIMSELF  
20110130194029.000|20110130194031.000|CC1|TO KEEP UP.
